name: Ema Personal Wiki
tagline: Get yourself a wiki and feel like a geek
body:
Ema Personal Wiki is a notebook with linkable pages for tracking your ideas, information, todo lists, tasks, bookmarks, projects, notes, brainstorms - in short, your life - in the most flexible way. Create pages with information, and link these pages by simply using a WikiWord on another page. This keeps you completely in charge of how you want to organize your personal notebook.

It has two versions: an Android and a Windows version, which are synchronized with your [Dropbox](http://db.tt/1Wa4lgW) account.

### Download and install
The installer for the Windows version: [download link](http://www.janwillemboer.nl/ema/windows/EmaPersonalWiki-Installer.exe). It is free and open source. The source can be found on [github](https://github.com/janwillemb/Ema-Personal-Wiki).

The Android version can be downloaded from the Android Market. Search for "Personal Wiki" to find it (and alternatives), or click [this link}(market://search?q=pname:com.janwillemboer.ema) (Android only).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
